00001 import wx
00002 
00003 import vtk
00004 from vtk.wx.wxVTKRenderWindow import wxVTKRenderWindow
00005 
00006 class Viewer(wxVTKRenderWindow):
00007 
00008     def __init__(self, parent):
00009 
00010         wxVTKRenderWindow.__init__(self, parent, -1)
00011 
00012         self.renren = vtk.vtkRenderer()
00013         self.GetRenderWindow().AddRenderer(self.renren)
00014         
00015         reader = vtk.vtkUnstructuredGridReader()
00016         reader.SetFileName("VTKExample.vtk")
00017         reader.SetScalarsName("_I_PORV")
00018 
00019         surfaceMapper = vtk.vtkDataSetMapper()
00020         surfaceMapper.SetInputConnection(reader.GetOutputPort())
00021         surfaceMapper.SetScalarRange((1e3, 2e6))
00022 
00023         surfaceActor = vtk.vtkActor()
00024         surfaceActor.SetMapper(surfaceMapper)
00025 
00026         self.renren.AddActor(surfaceActor)
00027             
00028         self.renren.ResetCamera()
00029         self.renren.BackingStoreOn()
00030 
00031 
00032 class MainFrame(wx.Frame):
00033 
00034     def __init__(self, parent, id, title, size):
00035 
00036         wx.Frame.__init__(self, parent, id, title, size=size)
00037         notebook = wx.Notebook(self, -1)
00038 
00039         for ii in xrange(2):
00040             page = Viewer(notebook)
00041             notebook.AddPage(page, "Viewer No %d"%(ii+1))
00042 
00043         self.CenterOnScreen()
00044         self.Show()
00045 
00046 app = wx.PySimpleApp()
00047 frame = MainFrame(None, -1, "VTK Example", (400, 400))
00048 app.MainLoop()
